content: I was trying to update our track's scenarios in Conman. Under the links tab, when I click the blue plus button to add a link, nothing happens. I opened the console in my browser and saw that clicking the button throws an error in the console (screenshot attached.) Just wanted to see if others experienced this issue, and if there's a plan to fix it. Thank you! conman-error.PNG

Brian Meshell said:

I was trying to update our track's scenarios in Conman. Under the links tab, when I click the blue plus button to add a link, nothing happens. I opened the console in my browser and saw that clicking the button throws an error in the console (screenshot attached.) Just wanted to see if others experienced this issue, and if there's a plan to fix it. Thank you! conman-error.PNG

@David Hay can you please take a look?
So I'm not getting that error. hmmm. could it be browser related? If you post the track and link you want here, I'll try it myself to see if it's something related to the track itself...
